mapper.select: SELECT ID AS id, PASSWORD AS password, NAME AS name, BIRTH AS birth, GENDER AS gender, PHONE AS phone, ADDR AS addr, EMAIL AS email, REGDATE AS regdate, FROM (SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 AS seq, member.* FROM MEMBER member) AS sum WHERE seq BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT ID AS id, PASSWORD AS password, NAME AS name, BIRTH AS birth, GENDER AS gender, PHONE AS phone, ADDR AS addr, EMAIL AS email, REGDATE AS regdate FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS seq, m.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE ${column} LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ) m) WHERE seq BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT ID AS id, PASSWORD AS password, NAME AS name, BIRTH AS birth, GENDER AS gender, PHONE AS phone, ADDR AS addr, EMAIL AS email, REGDATE AS regdate, PROFILE AS profile FROM MEMBER WHERE ID = #{id}
